meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unlikely.
meanings.sent1: The unlikelinesses of winning the lottery are very high.
meanings.sent2: There were many unlikelinesses in his story that made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent3: The unlikelinesses of a penguin flying are quite amusing to think about.
meanings.sent4: The unlikelinesses of finding a needle in a haystack are comparable to this situation.
meanings.sent5: The unlikelinesses of a fish climbing a tree are as clear as day.

meanings.sent1: The unlikelinesses of a snowstorm in July are rare but not impossible.
meanings.sent2: She faced many unlikelinesses on her journey, but she never gave up.
meanings.sent3: The unlikelinesses of a cat walking a tightrope would be quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The unlikelinesses of a volcano erupting in the middle of a city are terrifying to imagine.
meanings.sent5: The unlikelinesses of a turtle winning a race against a rabbit are quite amusing.
